#SETUP: disable:NumberIsFloat

>> Sequence(3,20000000000000000000000000001,20000000000000000000000000001)
Table({Value:20000000000000000000000000001},{Value:40000000000000000000000000002},{Value:60000000000000000000000000003})

>> Sequence(5,20000000000000000000000000001,20000000000000000000000000001)
Table({Value:20000000000000000000000000001},{Value:40000000000000000000000000002},{Value:60000000000000000000000000003},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})})

>> Sequence(4,-10000000000000000000000000001,-10000000000000000000000000001)
Table({Value:-10000000000000000000000000001},{Value:-20000000000000000000000000002},{Value:-30000000000000000000000000003},{Value:-40000000000000000000000000004})

>> Sequence(5,-30000000000000000000000000001,-30000000000000000000000000001)
Table({Value:-30000000000000000000000000001},{Value:-60000000000000000000000000002},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})})
